name: HoldemAI
short_description: Full ring Texas Hold'em poker game built around an intelligent AI system. The AI uses players' betting actions to calculate a probability distribution of their hole cards and uses it to evaluate hand strength and the best possible action. Small random changes are made to mimic human behavior and make the AI less predictable. Future versions will include adaptive opponent modeling using neural networks to improve the AI's strength. The AI code can be easily adapted for input from screen scrapers.
